Name: Machete
Wine Description: Aromas of crème de cassis, boysenberry, and ripe cherries are complemented by a soft minerality and hints of dark chocolate. The entry is smooth with dark plums and a charred meatiness that creates a velvety texture that lingers.

Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Intense ruby red with garnet reflections. Elegant, full, harmonious and persistent with suggestions of vanilla and raspberry. Long and velvety, full, generous and warm.

Name: La Grola
Wine Description: A full-bodied, intense and elegant wine. Deep ruby red in colour, it has a wide and embracing bouquet with scents of wild berries and juniper, tobacco and coffee essence. La Grola is the extraordinary result of the meeting of two great personalities: the hill of La Grola and the Valpolicella’s autochthonous grapes. The excellent exposure of the vineyards, which enjoy the sun’s warm rays and the cool breezes that come from nearby Lake Garda, allows the grapes to produce their very best. Careful, craftsman-like ageing in the cellar yields a red wine with great elegance, harmony and finesse that can evolve positively for over a decade.

Name: Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Full-bodied with a silky mouthfeel and flavors of cherry, blackberry, bergamot, anise and earth. Exceptionally balanced with velvety tannins, lively acidity and a lingering finish.

Name: Don Vicè Cerasuolo di Vittoria
Wine Description: Bright garnet cherry red colour intense red fruit, spicy (liquorice and cinnamon), mineral character (graphite) with good tannins, gratifying crispness, full-bodied, well-balanced, dry and fruity.

Name: BIN 6410 Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Cherry and raspberry fruit with hints of clove,cinnamon, pie crust and dried flowers. On the palate, the juicy, dark fruits are abundant initially as the spice tones and toasty oak arrive shortly after with a finish of soft tannins and bright, clean acidity.

Name: Two Old Dogs Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Intense of cherry red color.Aromas of wild mint, tobacco, menthol, licorice with fruit flavors of cherry, raspberry and blueberry.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: On the palate, the tannins are smooth and the flavors are rich and mouth filling, with abundant ripe fruit and layers of vanilla and sweet oak. Aromas of dark plum, nutmeg and cardamom, as well as French oak-inspired hints of vanilla. On the palate, bright red fruit flavors are balanced by well-integrated acidity, all leading to a soft, silky-tannined finish.

Name: Sela Rioja
Wine Description: Middle layer background and bright red cherry red trim. It has aromas unfold notes of ripe cherry and slight feeling of ripe peach appear. Is clearly seen finely spicy character and a slight mineral.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This Pinot Noir displays aromas of candied cherry, pomegranate and raspberry on the nose and the palate as well as a light touch of nutmeg, cinnamon and allspice. It is elegantly textured with seamlessly integrated, silky, polished tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Dark garnet red in color. On the nose the wine has lovely aromas of wild strawberry, red plum, cherry and rhubarb, with a lovely savory earthy quality intermingled with the fruit.

Name: Proprietary Red
Wine Description: This wine is a bold and expressive blend crafted to satisfy the modern palate. It has rich, full fruit flavors and soft, elegant tannins.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This wine displays aromas of cherry, strawberry and violets. Notes of vanilla and cola are also shown.

Name: El Sender
Wine Description: Deep red colour with ruby luminosity.It is in this freshness that notes of black berry and light balsamic emerge, The Sender has a garnet color with ruby light. It wakes offering a wide range of aromas, with a sense of volume, maturity and freshness equally.

Name: Grenache
Food Pairing: Beef, Lamb, Vegetarian, Poultry, Spicy food
Wine Description: Fragrant featuring aromas of freshly picked strawberry,wild red cherry and pomegranate jelly. Ground white pepper and dried rose petals further enhance the palate by exuding flavors of stewed raspberry.

Name: Syrah
Wine Description: Deep opaque bright purple-ruby in colour. The enticingly perfumed bouquet is exotic with hints of wild herbs, violets, plum fruit and has a pronounced savoury and spicy character. The palate is intense and rich with generous ripe fruit and structured, silky tannins. There is a delicious, lingering, fruit and spice aftertaste.

Name: Saint George Nemea
Wine Description: The colour is bright, deep morello cherry-red. The nose reveals aromas of blackberries, raspberries, and ripe strawberries with a touch of aniseed and spices such as clove and cinnamon. It is a medium-bodied wine with elegant structure, balanced acidity and very ripe, elegant tannins. The finish is moderately-long, dominated by red fruits and followed by sweet vanilla and black pepper.

Name: Diamond Collection Zinfandel
Wine Description: Spicy, jammy, and bold, Diamond Collection Zinfandel delivers richly concentrated fruit, supple tannins, and a well-textured palate that crescendos with exotic spice notes, pepper, and a touch of minerals.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright red fruits on the nose, a rich pallet and nice mineral notes on the finish.

Name: Monastrell
Wine Description: After the malolactic fermentation the wine is aged in French and American barrels for a short period (from 3 to 6 months) with the purpose of obtaining fresh and fruity wines with the character of the monastrell.

Name: Júlio Bastos Grande Reserva
Wine Description: It has made from the best grapes of old, fermented vineyards marble mills, using the traditional "steps grape" and aged in new French oak barrels for a year, features a retinta ruby ​​color and a rich clean scent berries in connection with mint and spices. The flavor is intense and round, with velvety tannins and a long finish.

Name: Syrah Paso Robles
Wine Description: Opaque dark ruby black color. Delicate, fruity, toasty earthy aromas and flavors of spicy vanilla nougat, toasted meringue, dried berries and lemon, and pickle with a glycerous, crisp,dry yet fruity medium full body and a warming, complex, medium-length black raspberry pie and vanilla custard finish with well integrated, fine tannins and moderate oak. A nice spicy, snappy syrah with juicy acidity.

Name: Dogliani
Wine Description: Ruby red colour which tends toward violet, of a rich fresh fruity fragrance, full bodied with an intense aroma of undergrowth and a pleasantly tannic taste with a slight final almond note.

Name: Rubio
Wine Description: Brilliant ruby red with purplish highlights, this wine is intense and persistent, with fresh aromas of cherries, violets and red currants, followed by subtle, spicy nuances. Artfully- structured with balanced tannins and a lingering aromatic finish. The hints of forest fruits and cherries that characterise the varietal make it an easily approachable wine while still rendering it intense and elegant.

Name: Reserva Tinto
Wine Description: It has a robust ruby red wine, with dense aromas of red berries and pudding spice. Flavours on the palate are bright, thick and jammy, with fine-grained, well integrated tannins and good length.

Name: Primitivo Puglia Infinitum
Wine Description: Brilliant ruby red with purple glints.Fresh and intense bouquet,fragrant with spicy notes.Round taste,soft and velvety.

Name: GSM
Wine Description: Enticing aromas of strawberry, black cherry, white pepper and cinnamon. On the palate, notes of raspberry, a hint of cinnamon spice, along with strawberry and black cherry. Finishing with a smooth and luscious mouth feel.

Name: Basarin Barbaresco
Wine Description: The bouquet is layered with forest floor, violet, rose and berry, while the palate delivers ripe cherry, white pepper, cinnamon and mint flavors. The tannins are still youthful and tight.

Name: Adama Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep dark ruby red with cherry hues and a rich round body. Core flavors of black forest fruit, cassis and blueberries with chocolate, vanilla and coffee are pronounced. Notes of aged wood combined with balanced acidity lead to a long complex finish.

Name: Médoc
Wine Description: An attractive bouquet: lightly roasted wood spice and nicely concentrated blackcurrant fruit. A very good wine, straightforward, well-priced for a Bordeaux Medoc.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The palate is friendly and fresh acidity. Alcohol is warm and tannin marked with a fleshy body. The aromas in mouth are ripe red fruits, chocolate, tamarind pod again spices (pepper, cinnamon and vanilla), wood, dried figs and black licorice. It is a perfectly balanced wine with great persistence and complexity.

Name: Russian River Valley Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The Russian River Valley Pinot Noir is a well-balanced, food-friendly wine with bright berry flavors – red cherry, raspberry and blackberry – with hints of licorice and red zinger tea on the finish. The aromas of wild strawberries and spices delight the nose.

Name: Pergolaia
Wine Description: The wine Has A medium ruby in color with garnet edges. In the nose cherries, prunes, licorice, dried red fruits, chocolate, clove, and earthy notes. On the palate the wine showes cherries, red berries, raspberry, prune, cocoa, spices, clove and earthy notes as well as hints of cola, coffee and tobacco.

Name: San Andreas Fault Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright red berries, crushed flowers, sweet tobacco, chalk and pine are laced together in an aromatically expressive, mid-weight Pinot loaded with pure class.

Name: Don David Reserve Malbec
Wine Description: Vivacious red with violet sparkles. Plum jam and raisin combined with pipe tobacco, vanilla and toasted notes dominate the aroma. Very well balanced together with sweat and soft tannins. Fruity, full of plumb and chocolate notes.

Name: Yamhill Cuvée Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aroma profile that consists of red fruits, minerals, spice, earth, and hint of French Oak. The palate offers youthful tannins and balanced acidity which lead to a smooth and graceful finish

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Adored by wine enthusiasts throughout the Vivino community, the rich, beautifully rounded Quilt Cabernet Sauvignon offers a bold yet balanced structure, making it one of our best-selling wines, season after season. Boasting a deep ruby colour, Quilt Cabernet Sauvignon is a popular wine produced from the Cabernet Sauvignon grape variety. This much-loved red wine is renowned for its rich and bold flavor profile, characterized by dark fruit notes such as blackberry, plum and cassis. It is down to the careful ageing process, either in oak barrels or stainless steel tanks, that enhances its complexity and imparts its celebrated, subtle oak flavors. The grapes used in the making of this Quilt Cabernet Sauvignon are carefully sourced from the world renowned, iconic regions throughout the Napa Valley, ensuring the highest quality wine and unmistakable flavor profile. Classic yet complex, romantic but not ostentatious, Napa Valley wines hold their place in Vivino customers’ hearts, and for good reason too. With the view that ‘a wine’s character is inseparable from its history’, any Quilt wine guarantees you'll be transported to its bucolic origins after your very first sip. Pairing perfectly with hearty dishes such as game, beef, lamb and poultry, as well as mature and hard cheese, Quilt Cabernet Sauvignon earns its place as a host and hostess’ favourite, and a must-serve at dinner parties up and down the U.S.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Softly textured, full bodied, and well balanced. A ripely flavored wine with moderate depth and a long finish, tasting of plum, cherry, red licorice, and modest oak.

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Typical aromas of ripe fruit, fruit preserve and cherry are immediately perceived on first olfactory examination. Particularly striking is the incredible long length that lingerson the palate, when the wine displays all its strength through a warm an elegant body.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has fruit aromas of dark cherry, trufe, espresso, dried cherries and incense. Bright palate and full of cherry cola fruit with vanilla and oak undertones and a wonderful velvety texture.

Name: Rosso Veneto
Wine Description: Intense purple colour, tending towards amber with ageing. This wine has a very solid structure due to the elevated alcohol and the balance between soft tannins and acidity.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Cherry, blackberry and cola, light and pretty raspberry fruit gains mass and flavor interest with well-integrated veins of stem and earth. It’s nicely balanced and true to variety.

Name: Rattlesnake Zinfandel
Wine Description: Filled with an alluring mouthwatering quality with robust flavors that includes ripe blueberries, blackberries, cherry jam and fig all tied together by a brambly undertone. Accents of white pepper, licorice and smoke weave through wine, deepening throughout the luscious finish.
